Helton Traber de Castilho

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/8058614801824845
  • Última atualização do currículo em 02/04/2009

Graduate at Universidade Federal de São Paulo (1977), general surgery residence( HSPE FMO) (1978-79), plastic surgery residence (HSPE.FMO).(1980-82),fellow in otorrynolaringologic plastic surgery (1982-83), master's from Universidade Federal de São Paulo (1986) and Ph.D. from Universidade Federal de São Paulo (1994). Instructor of plastic surgery in medical residence (1984-1994) HSPE.FMO. Visitor professor in UNIFESP.EPM.(1990-94), Professor of plastic surgery in UNIFESP.EPM. since 1994.Visitor Professor in West Virginia University (1997) Represent of Brasilian Plastic Surgery Society (SBCP) in Brasilian Medical Society (AMB) (2000-03). Comission coordinator for specialist certification (AMB/SBCP) (2000-03). General Secretary of Brasilian Plastic Surgery Society (SBCP) (2002-03). Visitor Professor in AiBee Indonesia University (2006-07) Has experience in Medicine, focusing on Plastic Surgery/ Rhynoplasty. (Texto informado pelo autor)
